text: Tumi mane karabe tara jagrata, athaca tara nidrita. Ami taderake parsba paribartana kara'i dana dike o bama dike. Tadera kukura chila samanera pa duti guhadbare prasarita kare. Yadi tumi umki diye taderake dekhate, tabe pechana phire palayana karate ebam tadera bhaye atanka grasta haye parate.
